com.rohitsood.urlybird.server
Class DatabaseNetworkServerStarter

java.lang.Object
  com.rohitsood.urlybird.server.DatabaseNetworkServerStarter
public final class DatabaseNetworkServerStarter
extends java.lang.Object

Starts and stops the network server. Defines and uses the system properties needed to successfully start the network server. Defines the codebase, user directory, the name of the jar file from which the application should run. Starts the RMI Registry and binds the remote objects to the registry. Unbinds the remote objects from the registry.

Version:
1.3
Author:
Rohit Sood

Method Detail

start

public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
Starts the server. Starts the registry and binds appropriate objects.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If any failures occur starting registry or binding objects.

stop

public void stop()
          throws java.lang.Exception
Stops the server. Unbinds remote objects and stops the registry.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If any failures occur starting registry.

isStarted

public boolean isStarted()
Gets the boolean which represents the started state.

Returns:
If true then the server is started, false the server is stopped.

Returns the instance of the DatabaseNetworkServerStarter.
